snippet.title: Love The Way You Lie - MASHUP (free mp3!)
snippet.description:
Check out our epic song with Coke Bottles!! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZzuRvzsNpTU
SUBSCRIBE! I promise, it's fun :1 http://bit.ly/SubscribeKHS
Sam Tsui singing, Kurt Schneider producing a fun mashup of "Love The Way You Lie", "Dynamite", and "Teenage Dream."  

Share this video on Facebook here!: http://bit.ly/SamTsuiLoveTheWayYouLieMashup

And if you feel like it, you can donate a dollar or two here-- http://bit.ly/c7gGjh
We love bringing you these songs, and appreciate all your support :)

-----------------------------------------------

Many thanks to my friend Chris Ripley ( http://www.christopherripley.com ) for helping out with some of the camera work.

Check out more of Sam here:
http://www.Facebook.com/SamTsuiMusic
http://www.Twitter.com/SamuelTsui
http://www.Myspace.com/SamTsui

And here's my new official Facebook Page:
http://www.Facebook.com/KurtHugoSchneider

...and Twitter:
http://www.Twitter.com/KurtHSchneider

:)
